name: generative composition #4
description:
generative composition #4 to study how composition together with the selection of colors and shapes affects our perception of 2d and 3d spaces, and to create meanings. 

the generative painting method uses time stamps throughout the process as seeds for shapes and their shades, making the piece unique and not repeatable (time stamp seeds not saved). 

no random numbers in use (beyond operations on time stamps).

created on 2021-09-19 by tomi

6765 × 6765px
